events.name: Colosseum Event
events.desc: Take a brief tour of the Orre region and find a special 'Pure' Celebi!

events.name: Dance Party in Orre Event
events.desc: Put on your dancing shoes and tango with Miror B and his Ludicolo! Afterwards, take a relaxing break at the PokeSpot and catch a special extra 'cool' Ludicolo of your own!

events.name: Rainbow Mirage Island Appears
events.desc: To celebrate pride month, take a trip to Rainbow Mirage Island and catch a Pridetales!
